eventDecorators.name: IssuanceDebtRatioEntry
eventDecorators.description: An event emitted when a vault is liquidated.

eventDecorators.name: OwnerChanged
eventDecorators.description: An event emitted when a vault is liquidated.

eventDecorators.name: OwnerNominated
eventDecorators.description: An event emitted when a vault is liquidated.

functionDecorators.name: appendAccountIssuanceRecord
functionDecorators.description: Logs an accounts issuance data in the current fee period which is then stored historically. onlyFeePool to call me on pynthetix.issue() & pynthetix.burn() calls to store the locked PNX per fee period so we know to allocate the correct proportions of fees and rewards per period accountIssuanceLedger[account][0] has the latest locked amount for the current period. This can be update as many time accountIssuanceLedger[account][1-2] has the last locked amount for a previous period they minted or burned.

parameterDecorators.name: debtRatio
parameterDecorators.description: Debt of this account as a percentage of the global debt.

parameterDecorators.name: debtEntryIndex
parameterDecorators.description: The index in the global debt ledger. pynthetix.pynthetixState().issuanceData(account).

parameterDecorators.name: currentPeriodStartDebtIndex
parameterDecorators.description: The startingDebtIndex of the current fee period.

functionDecorators.name: applicableIssuanceData
functionDecorators.description: Find the oldest debtEntryIndex for the corresponding closingDebtIndex.

parameterDecorators.name: closingDebtIndex
parameterDecorators.description: the last periods debt index on close.

parameterDecorators.name: index
parameterDecorators.description: Index in the array to retrieve. Upto FEE_PERIOD_LENGTH.

functionDecorators.name: importIssuerData
functionDecorators.description: Import issuer data from pynthetixState.issuerData on FeePeriodClose() block #. Only callable by the contract owner, and only for 6 weeks after deployment.

parameterDecorators.name: periodToInsert
parameterDecorators.description: The Fee Period to insert the historical records into.

parameterDecorators.name: feePeriodCloseIndex
parameterDecorators.description: An accounts debtEntryIndex is valid when within the fee peroid, since the input ratio will be an average of the pervious periods it just needs to be > recentFeePeriods[periodToInsert].startingDebtIndex < recentFeePeriods[periodToInsert - 1].startingDebtIndex.

functionDecorators.name: setFeePool
functionDecorators.description: set the FeePool contract as it is the only authority to be able to call appendAccountIssuanceRecord with the onlyFeePool modifer. Must be set by owner when FeePool logic is upgraded.
